summary: Updates Skyrims water texture with new shiny one.
descriptionHtml:
HD Water texture for skyrim, looks awesome as you can see in pictures.
Texture\'s resolution upped succesfully to 3000x2000 with awsome results.

Have fun :)

Btw, dont be scared about the size of ZIP file, its because texture is has high resolution, and theres screenshots too.

Looks even more awesome with ENB and other graphics mods :)

Theres V3 coming, i\'ll try to make it fit in swamps aswell.
Waterfalls maybe get improved too.

One in the comments said that this looks awesome with RWT [Realistic Water Texture], so go on and try if you want.
author: Devistute
